para.programlisting:
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:http="http://www.28msec.com/modules/http" targetNamespace="http://www.28msec.com/modules/http" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<xs:simpleType name="cookieString"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[^;,%"= \t\n\r{}]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:element name="cookie"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="david" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="name" type="cookieString"/> <xs:attribute name="expires" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:attribute name="domain" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="path" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="secure" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element>
</xs:schema>
